tables.rationale: Table shows net sales by product categories including iPhone, Mac, iPad, Wearables, Home and Accessories, and Services for fiscal years 2023-2025, with amounts in millions, from Item 8 / Notes.
Table discloses net sales by geography (U.S., China, Other countries) for fiscal years 2023-2025, with amounts in millions, providing geographic revenue disaggregation.
Table presents gross margin and gross margin percentage by Products and Services for fiscal years 2023-2025, offering additional revenue-related financial detail by product/service.
